hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the song written in the #royal tomb# is #a Green Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found on #the Death Mountain Trail#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Song of Storms#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the fastest way forward is walking backwards.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Lost Woods# is a foolish choice.

GC (Maze).text: They say that a room containing a #large pot in the Shadow Temple# holds...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Green Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Single Giant Pot

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that in the #Sacred Forest Meadow#, Sheik teaches #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path to #the Key#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals a #generic grotto#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that a #spider in the wasteland# holds #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that Flare Dancers do not fear Goron-crafted blades.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Big Lava Room Blocked Door Chest

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Ice Cavern GS Heart Piece Room

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: You're comparing yourself to me?^Ha! You're not even good enough to be my fake.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Requiem of Spirit# can be found at #Zora's River#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: Fingers-Mazda, the first thief in the world, stole fire from the gods.^But he was unable to fence it.&It was too hot.&He got really burned on that deal.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to #Man in Green's House#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #0# major items.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that in the #river in the Water Temple# lies...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #a Spirit Temple Small Key# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #100 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Zora's Fountain# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that plundering #inside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Trail## has #2# major items.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the path to the #Goron Ruby#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Field# is a foolish choice.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that ##the Lost Woods## has #0# major items.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #100 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Song of Storms#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 4 Top

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides #Mido's house#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that on the path to the #right hand of the Spirit Temple# a chest and a spider hold...^ #a Forest Temple Small Key# and #Saria's Song#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Sun Block Room Chest
Spirit Temple GS Hall After Sun Block Room
